messages.message:
Feature request - Build - Quick Clean amount

The current quick clean options are good, but it seems like we have a major gap when it comes to cleaning numbers/amounts.  Currently, I'm having to paste this cleaning prompt into each field, which isn't terribly hard to do, but this feels like an easy win and not something we should make every customer do for such a common data type:
> Clean this number to US dollar formatting (but no dollar sign), with 2 decimal places, no commas, and negative values are represented with a minus at the beginning instead of parenthesis.

Update: turns out the prompt wasn't a foolproof fix.  It ended up reading a comma as a decimal pretty consistently, so I tried adding an earlier cleaning step to remove characters `,` .  However, now my Build tab has gone unresponsive and crashed.

Update 2: prompting to clean an amount is proving difficult to do consistently.  It seemingly wants to invent a decimal place 2 characters in and I can't think of a better way to clarify.

This doesn't feel like the experience we'd want external customers to deal with for what I would wager must be one of our most common data types.

Related Q, but likely a separate feature request:
Is there a way to call the same cleaning function between multiple fields?

Like if I wrote a `clean_amount` function for class A, field 1, it seems like I should just be able to call that function in class C, field 13 without copy/pasting it.  If there is a way to do this, I haven't found it.
